contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Ethically woven from the finest European flax, our mid-weight linen crib sheet offers year-round comfort for your little one. Pre-washed for superior softness, our heirloom-quality linen only gets softer over time.  Set includes 2 fitted crib sheets.
contentfulProduct.title: European Linen Fitted Crib Sheet Set

content.value: Ethically woven from the finest European flax, our mid-weight linen crib sheet offers year-round comfort for your little one. Pre-washed for superior softness, our heirloom-quality linen only gets softer over time. Set includes 2 fitted crib sheets.
Woven from 100% European Flax
150-gsm
Breathable, yet insulating; best for year-round comfort
Set includes 2 fitted crib sheets
Sheet fits crib mattress up to 10" deep
Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
Launder with our all natural 100% New Zealand Wool Dryer Balls for added softness
Made with care in China

Machine washable. We recommend machine washing on the gentle or delicate cycle with like colors, with cold water. Line dry, or tumble dry low and remove promptly. Use a steamer as needed. Use a hot iron as needed.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Woven from 100% European Flax

  • Set includes 2 fitted crib sheets
  • Sheet fits crib mattress up to 10" deep

  • Launder with our all natural 100% New Zealand Wool Dryer Balls for added softness
  • Made with care in China
